PAYMENT AND REFUND POLICY \n
PAYMENT POLICY

Advance is taken for booking subscription. The amount is non-refundable once the customer confirms the subscription upon the verification call by the Permarent customer care team. If the customer has paid deposit and has accepted furniture delivery, the deposit is non –refundable if the furniture is returned in less than 3 months. Rentals must be paid within the first 7 days after due date. Delayed payment of monthly rentals beyond due date shall attract a penal interest of 5% per day from the date of default till the time the monthly rentals is paid. Non-payment of monthly rentals within 7 days beyond due date could result in termination of subscription and removal of the furniture. Customers are required to ensure adequate funds in their bank account on the date of Auto Debit transaction. Non-payment of monthly rentals for consecutive two months could result in termination of subscription and removal of the furniture The Company will endeavour to debit the investor bank account on the due date, however if there is any delay all such transactions are debited subsequently The Company or its authorized banker or agent will initiate the Auto Debit form registrations/ debit transactions The Company / Sponsor Bank are not liable for the bank charges, if any debited from investor’s bank account by the destination bank, on account of payment. Customers are requested to hand over a cancelled cheque for the account to which the auto debit is being set up to the delivery personnel from the Company. All rights and remedies as applicable in case of dishonor of a cheque are available against dishonour of electronic funds transfer instructions / auto debit mandates under insufficiency of funds as are available under Section 138 of the Negotiable Instruments Act, 1881\n
CANCELLATION OF SUBSCRIPTION CAN BE DONE UNDER THE FOLLOWING CIRCUMSTANCES:

During Initial Subscription Period - The Initial Subscription period is 3 months. Customer can avail ofall subscription benefits during this period. The Customer can also terminate his subscription during this period. In such an event, Permarent would retain the initial deposit. Any other charges as applicable would be charged. After Initial Subscription Period - Post the Initial Subscription period, customer can terminate subscription with 15 days notice. In case, a 15 days notice is not given, Permarent would deduct rent of one month and refund the remaining amount. Other: The Company can terminate the Subscription after giving a 10 days written notice/email to the Subscriber.\n
REFUND POLICIES

Refund requests must include the name of the subscriber. Refunds will be credited back to the original card (credit or debit) used for payment. Refunds are issued under the following circumstances:
Customer or Permarent terminating subscription after initial subscription period Customer or Permarent terminating subscription during initial subscription period Within 7 working days from the date of issue of Pick Up instructions, the Company shall process forrefund of Security Deposit, subject to deduction of damages, unpaid monthly rentals and any other deductions as applicable. Refund would be done through a NEFT transfer. Refunds would be tracked by Permarent’s in-house Customer Care and updates shared accordingly with customer.\n
DELIVERY AND PICK-UP POLICY

Currently we deliver at nominal charges to any point within Gurgaon. Customer would be intimated of delivery status and timings a day in advance by the Customer careteam. In case of partial, damaged or incorrect delivery, the replacement is done in next 48 hours. We adhere strictly to our delivery time lines confirmed earlier by our in-house Customer Care team.In rare instances when delivery is delayed, we inform our customers at least two hours in advance for any delay. During delivery, the customer or his/her spouse/parents or any relations can accept delivery after checking quality of furniture.\n
QUALITY CHECKS DURING DELIVERY

During time of delivery, the customer is requested to check and verify the quality and details of each piece of furniture being set up. This is to ensure that the customer receives exactly what has been ordered to his satisfaction.\n
POST DELIVERY

During setup or post-delivery, if the customer, for any reasons, is not completely satisfied with the product, due to it being damaged or defective, the particular piece can be replaced free of charge if company agrees.\n
PICK-UP POLICY

Pick up of furniture from customer's house is done within 24-72 hours. Customer is updated by mail 24 hours prior of pick up time. The correspondence would also include balance payment and refund details. The pickup is done free of charges from the point of original invoice address.\n
RENT-TO-OWN POLICY

Rent-to-Own is a unique option offered by Permarent to its customers and users. Upon choosing this option, the transaction shall fall under a rental purchase agreement. The customer needs to make 18 payments, plus tax to acquire ownership of the rented goods. To calculate the cost of ownership before tax, multiply the monthly price as shown alongside the product(s) by 18.
You do not acquire ownership rights unless the product is rented and paid for 18 payment periods. You may exercise an early payment option that is disclosed in the lease.
On choosing of the rent to own option by the customer, the security deposit amount for 3 months rental shall become non-refundable, which is refundable otherwise. All other terms and conditions of your Rental Agreement remain in effect.
Currently, Rent to Own option is applicable only on rentals under the “Furniture” category in Gurgaon.
